headline: Jim Cramer on TKO: “Its Business Seems to Be on Fire”
summary: TKO Group Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:TKO) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer discussed recently. Cramer highlighted the company’s most profitable divisions during the episode, as he remarked: “Could your portfolio stand to be a little more combative? Over the past few years, through a series of complex mergers, we’ve seen the rise of TKO Group […]
